name: 板(白)
description: A metal wall.  Keeps zombies outside the vehicle and prevents people from seeing through it.

description: A half-height thin metal wall.  Keeps zombies outside the vehicle but allows people to see over it.

name: 不透明ハッチ(白)
description: A strong door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: トランクドア(白)
description: A short door.  You can always see over it, open or closed.

description: A strong door.  A window lets you see through it when closed.

name: 屋根(白)
description: A metal roof.
